content: > **please note ** the graphs for this > pattern are free to view in its > entirety on my blog this ad-free > downloadable pdf enables me to be able > to bring you more free patterns in the > future go to the free graphs here 2 you can buy just the square pattern here 3 **description ** one simple square can be classic and beautiful in your hands with the field of flowers bag this design works up in 13 individual squares which are then seamed together to make the body of the bag seaming and straps are complete the design this pattern is simple in design but great for stash busting and exploring work it up in 1 color or a dozen it s totally up to you just have fun with it this pdf includes the print graph written instructions and assembly instructions images of the graphs and the written instructions for seaming are available on divinedebris com 4 the sample in the photos was made in basic sttich by lion brand yarn 5 affiliate link you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2025 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design
